name: Library Management
description: This project is a desktop application to manage the library of Liceo Palmar. It allows operations such as adding, editing, deleting, and searching for books, as well as managing their loans, storing records in an SQLite database.

name: Draw2Gether
description: Real-time application that allows multiple users to draw simultaneously. This collaborative platform is designed to facilitate creativity and visual communication among users, allowing them to work together on a shared canvas from anywhere in the world. The application does not allow the creation of rooms; instead, all users share a single canvas.

name: Videos2Gether
description: This project is a web application that allows users to watch YouTube videos synchronously in shared rooms. Users can create private or public rooms and chat in real-time while enjoying the videos. The application includes features to play videos, save history, and manage the room with advanced options for administrators. Additionally, it has a user authentication and authorization system, and saves the state of the room, allowing users to resume from where they left off upon reconnecting.
